name: post_comments
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool get_100_success_instagram_api_scalable_robust.
Tool description: 750 requests a minute, 100% success rate Instagram API, any scale is supported. Need help/ custom plan? contact us on Telegram: https://t.me/apimaster10 Join the channel for updates: https://t.me/socialdataapis
API description: Retrieves comments of a specified Instagram post using the given media ID.

mediaid.description: The ID of the Instagram media for which to retrieve comments.

min_id.description: The minimum ID of comments to retrieve, useful for pagination. Defaults to '{}'.

max_id.description: The maximum ID of comments to retrieve, useful for pagination. Defaults to '{}'.
